name: coryd.dev
description: The source for my personal site. Built using 11ty (and other tools).

scripts.publish:analytics: node scripts/worker-build.mjs analytics && wrangler deploy --env production --config workers/analytics/wrangler.toml
scripts.publish:contact: node scripts/worker-build.mjs contact && wrangler deploy --env production --config workers/contact/wrangler.toml
scripts.publish:playing: node scripts/worker-build.mjs playing && wrangler deploy --env production --config workers/playing/wrangler.toml
scripts.publish:rebuild: node scripts/worker-build.mjs rebuild && wrangler deploy --env production --config workers/rebuild/wrangler.toml
scripts.publish:scrobble: node scripts/worker-build.mjs scrobble && wrangler deploy --env production --config workers/scrobble/wrangler.toml

author: Cory Dransfeldt
